license_title: Open Data Commons Open Database License (ODbL)
author: NST group2

resources.description: This dataset contains the third round survey which was carried out by the Mobile Citizen Helpdesks in Nepal - led by Accountability Lab and Local Interventions Group - as part of the Inter-Agency Common Feedback Project. The questionnaire includes information on communities biggest problems, concerns, needs and satisfaction in relation to the earthquake response.
resources.name: Citizen Feedback in Earthquake Affected Areas (Round 3)

organization.description: This is a organisation for training purposes. It is used to train government officials on using a data catalogue to publish Open Government Data. This is part of the Open Government Data program, coordinated by the Division for Public Administration and Development Management (DPADM) of the United Nations Department of Economic and Social Affairs (UNDESA). www.unpan.org/ogdce
organization.title: UNDESA OGD training
organization.name: undesa

name: citizen-feedback-in-earthquake-affected-areas-round-3
notes: This dataset contains the third round survey which was carried out by the Mobile Citizen Helpdesks in Nepal - led by Accountability Lab and Local Interventions Group - as part of the Inter-Agency Common Feedback Project. The questionnaire includes information on communities biggest problems, concerns, needs and satisfaction in relation to the earthquake response.
title: Citizen Feedback in Earthquake Affected Areas (Round 3)
